verses.verse: For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> we <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4337>pay<s%> <S%G4057>much<s%> <S%G4057>closer<s%> <S%G4337>attention<s%> to what we have <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> we <S%G3901>drift<s%> <S%G3901>away<s%> [from it.]

<S%G4459>how<s%> shall we <S%G1628>escape<s%> if we <S%G272>neglect<s%> <S%G5082>so<s%> <S%G5082>great<s%> a <S%G4991>salvation<s%>? <S%G3748>After<s%> it was at the <S%G746>first<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> it was <S%G950>confirmed<s%> to us by <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G191>heard,<s%>

<S%G2316>God<s%> also <S%G4901>bearing<s%> <S%G4901>witness<s%> with them, <S%G5037>both<s%> by <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders<s%> and by <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G1411>miracles<s%> and by <S%G3311>gifts<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to His own <S%G2308>will.<s%>
For He did not <S%G5293>subject<s%> to <S%G32>angels<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> to <S%G3195>come,<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we are <S%G2980>speaking.<s%>

But <S%G5100>one<s%> has <S%G1263>testified<s%> <S%G4225>somewhere,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> is <S%G444>man,<s%> that Thou <S%G3403>rememberest<s%> him? <S%G2228>Or<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> that Thou art <S%G1980>concerned<s%> <S%G1980>about<s%> him?

"Thou hast <S%G1642>made<s%> him for a <S%G1024>little<s%> <S%G1024>while<s%> <S%G1642>lower<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G32>angels;<s%> Thou hast <S%G4737>crowned<s%> him with <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor,<s%> And hast <S%G2525>appointed<s%> him <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of Thy <S%G5495>hands;<s%>

Thou hast <S%G5293>put<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> his <S%G4228>feet.<s%>" For in <S%G5293>subjecting<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> to him, He <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> that is not <S%G506>subject<s%> to him. But <S%G3568>now<s%> we do not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G5293>subjected<s%> to him.

But we do <S%G991>see<s%> Him who has been <S%G1642>made<s%> for a <S%G1024>little<s%> <S%G1024>while<s%> <S%G1642>lower<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G32>angels,<s%> [namely,] <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3804>suffering<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G4737>crowned<s%> with <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor,<s%> that by the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> He might <S%G1089>taste<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> for <S%G3956>everyone.<s%>

For it was <S%G4241>fitting<s%> for Him, for <S%G3739>whom<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> and <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> in <S%G71>bringing<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> to <S%G1391>glory,<s%> to <S%G5048>perfect<s%> the <S%G747>author<s%> of their <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings.<s%>

For <S%G5037>both<s%> He who <S%G37>sanctifies<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> from <S%G1520>one<s%> [Father]; for <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G156>reason<s%> He is not <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> them <S%G80>brethren,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I will <S%G518>proclaim<s%> Thy <S%G3686>name<s%> to My <S%G80>brethren,<s%> In the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G1577>congregation<s%> I will <S%G5214>sing<s%> Thy <S%G5214>praise.<s%>"

And <S%G3825>again,<s%> "I will <S%G3982>put<s%> My <S%G3982>trust<s%> in Him." And <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> I and the <S%G3813>children<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> Me."

<S%G1893>Since<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> the <S%G3813>children<s%> <S%G2841>share<s%> in <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G129>blood,<s%> He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G3898>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3348>partook<s%> of the <S%G846>same,<s%> that <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> He might <S%G2673>render<s%> <S%G2673>powerless<s%> him who <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G2904>power<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> that is, the <S%G1228>devil;<s%>
and might <S%G525>deliver<s%> those <S%G3745>who<s%> through <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> were <S%G1777>subject<s%> to <S%G1397>slavery<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G2198>lives.<s%>
For <S%G1222>assuredly<s%> He does not <S%G1949>give<s%> <S%G1949>help<s%> to <S%G32>angels,<s%> but He <S%G1949>gives<s%> <S%G1949>help<s%> to the <S%G4690>descendant<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

<S%G3606>Therefore,<s%> He <S%G3784>had<s%> to be <S%G3666>made<s%> <S%G3666>like<s%> His <S%G80>brethren<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> that He might <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G1655>merciful<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> in things <S%G4314>pertaining<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G2433>make<s%> <S%G2433>propitiation<s%> for the <S%G266>sins<s%> of the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

For since He <S%G846>Himself<s%> was <S%G3985>tempted<s%> in that <S%G3739>which<s%> He has <S%G3958>suffered,<s%> He is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G997>come<s%> to the <S%G997>aid<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G3985>tempted.<s%>
